about.summary: Functions for the calculation of greenhouse gas flux rates  from closed chamber concentration measurements. The package follows  a modular concept: Fluxes can be calculated in just two simple steps  or in several steps if more control in details is wanted. Additionally  plot and preparation functions as well as functions for modelling gpp and reco are provided.

name: r-flux
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.3-0' %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-flux
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: flux_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/flux_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/flux/flux_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 470531d976594c2722ba1294b8364c24a334d4b93c896f1da02ef32b9662895d

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 1002

  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
requirements:
  build:
    - r-base
    - r-catools

  run:
    - r-base
    - r-catools

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('flux')"  # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('flux')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=flux
  license: GPL-2
  summary: 'Functions for the calculation of greenhouse gas flux rates  from closed chamber concentration
    measurements. The package follows  a modular concept: Fluxes can be calculated in
    just two simple steps  or in several steps if more control in details is wanted.
    Additionally  plot and preparation functions as well as functions for modelling
    gpp and reco are provided.'
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: '{{ environ["RECIPE_DIR"] }}/LICENSE'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - jdblischak
    - johanneskoester
    - bgruening
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
